name: json-data-paths
description: #### Easily extract complete paths to every property in an object. #### Created for use with [Simple Object Path](https://www.npmjs.com/package/simple-object-path) ```js const jsonDataPaths = require('./index') const obj = {animal:   {       type: 'Feline',       dailyNeeds: [           {timeOfDay: 'morning', need: 'Breakfast'},           {timeOfDay: 'evening', need: 'Dinner'}       ]   } }
author: JDS
